name: Monkey.D.Luffy
text: If you have 3 or more characters, your cost 3 or lower characters other than "Monkey D. Luffy" cannot be KO'd by your opponent's effects.

effect.text: If you have 3 or more characters, your cost 3 or lower characters other than "Monkey D. Luffy" cannot be KO'd by your opponent's effects.
